title: BiocBook.OHCA.Bioc2023
text:
Welcome
Package: BiocBook.OHCA.Bioc2023Authors: First Last [aut, cre]Compiled: 2023-08-10Package version: 0.99.0R version: R version 4.3.1 (2023-06-16)BioC version: 3.18License: MIT + file LICENSE
This is the landing page of the BiocBook entitled ‚Ä¶.
This book introduces the reader to ‚Ä¶.
Docker image
A Docker image built from this repository is available here:
üëâ ghcr.io/js2264/biocbook.ohca.bioc2023 üê≥






Get started now üéâ



You can get access to all the packages used in this book in < 1 minute, using this command in a terminal:



bash

docker run -it ghcr.io/js2264/biocbook.ohca.bioc2023:devel R




RStudio Server
An RStudio Server instance can be initiated from the Docker image as follows:



bash

docker run \
    --volume <local_folder>:<destination_folder> \
    -e PASSWORD=OHCA \
    -p 8787:8787 \
    ghcr.io/js2264/biocbook.ohca.bioc2023:devel


The initiated RStudio Server instance will be available at https://localhost:8787.
Session info






Click to expand üëá

    installed.packages()[,"Package"], 
    include_base = TRUE
)
